3.title: Development Lead and Python Programmer

Provided beneficiary institutions with access to critical data and detailed analysis, facilitating the identification of trends and patterns in the tourism sector. The project remains instrumental in improving the quality of decisions made by tourism agencies, allowing them to adjust strategies and respond more effectively to market dynamics.
